troops.name: Dummy
troops.description: Start with a Dummy

troops.name: Witch
troops.description: Every few seconds, she summons Skeletons with 50% of her max HP and attack damage

troops.name: Electro Wizard
troops.description: Shoots lightning with his hands, stunning multiple enemies every few seconds

troops.name: Baby Dragon
troops.description: Burps big fireballs that deal damage in a wide area

troops.name: Musketeer
troops.description: A tanky gunner who pushes 3 enemies back every few hits

troops.name: Electro Giant
troops.description: Summons an electric field around himself, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies every second

troops.name: Wizard
troops.description: Throws a fireball at enemies in the area

troops.name: Skeleton Dragons
troops.description: Splits to create a new Skeleton Dragon after every few attacks

troops.name: Executioner
troops.description: Throws his boomerang axe at the nearest target across several Hexes

troops.name: P.E.K.K.A
troops.description: A slow, but heavily armored melee fighter. Nothing gets past her..

troops.name: Bandit
troops.description: Jumps and strikes the largest group of enemies every few seconds, dealing damage and stunning enemies in its Hex Radius for 2s

troops.name: Mega Knight
troops.description: Jumps and strikes the largest group of enemies every Few seconds, dealing Damage and stunning enemies in its Hex Radius for 2s

troops.name: Archer
troops.description: Who needs all that armor when you've got wicked range and hot pink hair?

troops.name: Barbarian
troops.description: An all-around melee attacker with a mean mustache

troops.name: Valkyrie
troops.description: A melee master who channels her rage into area Damage

troops.name: Archer Queen
troops.description: Fires multiple arrows at her closest enemies. When her HP drops below 50%, she'll turn invisible and deal bonus Damage

troops.name: Goblin
troops.description: Goblin speed and melee skills eliminate the need for that pesky armor

troops.name: Spear Goblin
troops.description: Spears that slice through wind at such a wide range that he doesn't even need armor

troops.name: Dart Goblin
troops.description: An unarmored ranged attacker who runs fast, shoots far, and chews gum

troops.name: Goblin Machine
troops.description: Fires a rocket at the farthest enemy after certain hits, dealing 50% bonus Damage and stunning them for 1.5s

troops.name: Knight
troops.description: One of the toughest melee fighters in the kingdom

troops.name: Prince
troops.description: Combat Start: Charges at the nearest target, dealing double Damage, pushing back enemies and stunning them for 2s

troops.name: Princess
troops.description: Fires flaming arrows at the farthest enemy, dealing Damage in a 2-Hex Radius

troops.name: Golden Knight
troops.description: Dashes to the lowest HP enemy after defeating an enemy and deals bonus Damage

troops.name: Giant Skeleton
troops.description: Upon defeat, he drops a bomb that explodes after 1.5s, dealing Damage and stunning enemies in his Hex Radius for 2s

troops.name: Royal Ghost
troops.description: Becomes invisible for a short time after 3 hits

troops.name: Skeleton King
troops.description: Deals Damage to enemies in a cone radius and summons a Skeleton for every enemy he defeats

traits.name: Ace
traits.description: All Aces gain +20% Hit Speed at combat start. Your strongest Ace becomes the Captain instead of the strongest Troop with the highest Merge Level

bonuses.effect: Captain gains +60% bonus damage and +50% HP of damage dealt

traits.name: Clan
traits.description: Once per round, Clans rapidly heal and gain bonus Hit Speed at 50% HP

bonuses.effect: +30% of max HP and Hit Speed
Heals 60% max HP and gains +60% hit speed

traits.name: Goblin
traits.description: You'll get an extra random Goblin for free next round

bonuses.effect: +60% chance of gaining a 3 or 4-Elixir Goblin

traits.name: Noble
traits.description: Frontline Nobles (not any troops) take less damage, while backline Nobles (not any troops) gain bonus damage. New activation stats for 6 troops in certain modifiers

traits.name: Undead
traits.description: Combat Start: The enemy with the highest HP is cursed, and your Undead gain 20% bonus Damage when that enemy is defeated. New activation stats for 6 troops in certain modifiers

bonuses.effect: Curses 1 enemy, max HP cut by 25%
Curses 2 enemies, max HP cut by 50%
Curses 4 enemies, max HP cut by 75%

traits.name: Assassin
traits.description: Combat Start: Assassins will leap to the enemy's backline Troops. Assassin buffs are now activated at 2 & 4 troops, instead of 3

traits.name: Avenger
traits.description: Avengers gain bonus Damage, with the last woman standing gaining double Damage. Avenger buffs are now activated at 2 & 4 troops, instead of 3

traits.name: Brawler
traits.description: Brawlers gain even more max bonus HP and no longer heal teammates at 4 active troops

traits.name: Juggernaut
traits.description: Combat Start: Troops behind Juggernauts gain an 8s Shield.Juggernauts and allies behind now not only have a Shield, but are also immune to control effects when shielded.

traits.name: Ranger
traits.description: Rangers gain Hit Speed per attack, stacking up to 15x. Ranger buffs are now activated at 2 & 4 troops, instead of 3

traits.name: Blaster
traits.description: Blasters gain +1 Range and extra damage based on distance

traits.name: Electric
traits.description: After 10s, lightning strikes all enemies once and stunned troops 3x

bonuses.effect: Each strike deals 15% max HP damage

traits.name: Fire
traits.description: Gain stackable bonus damage upon enemies’ defeat

traits.name: Mage
traits.description: Combat Start: Strongest enemy troop is turned into a harmless rabbit for some time

rulers.name: Royale King
rulers.ability: Royal Commission: Losing grants you +4 Elixir

rulers.name: Spirit Empress
rulers.ability: Fusion Foresight: Every merge grants you +1 bonus Elixir

rulers.name: Goblin Queen
rulers.ability: Greener Grin: Defeating an enemy troop grants you a 40% chance of spawning a Goblin

rulers.name: Elixir Loong
rulers.ability: Endless Spring: Gain +1 Elixir per turn and +1 team size
